categories: Category:Lords of the Lost Tribe of Sith

nodes.text: Sammul Sharsha's husband was a male Lord of the Lost Tribe of Sith, who died a natural death, something unusually uncommon among Sith. His wife Sammul assumed the position of her husband in the Circle of Lords after his passing. With her he sired two children, one of whom was an artisan, the other a Sith Saber.
